title: Acron: Attack of the Squirrels!
notes: Steam shows Very Positive (94% of 154). SteamDB shows 84.45% positive (204 reviews). Blended to high‑80s. Steam store requires a VR player plus mobile players (iOS/Android); played together on a shared screen.
raw_comment: 1 VR player plays as a tree whose mission is to protect the golden acorns from theiving squirrels. The squirrels are played by 2-8 mobile device players. Seperate screens.
